title: ABB Business
subTitle: Login
customerNoSuccess: Dear Customer, information about the registration process will be sent to You by mail soon.

forgotPasswordForm.heading: Forgot password
forgotPasswordForm.description: Enter your username and you will receive an e-mail with password reset link.

forgotPasswordForm.sentToEmail: If the mentioned user exists, a link will be sent to your email.

resetPasswordForm.heading: Reset password
resetPasswordForm.errorMessage: <0>Your new password should be minimum</0> <1>12 characters long</1>. <0>Your new password should contain numbers, upper and lowercase letters and specific symbols (&,*,# etc).</0>

passwordResetAlert.heading: Password has been reset
passwordResetAlert.description: You can enter the system using your new password.

resetFailoryPage.heading: Link is not active
resetFailoryPage.description: The provided link can be used only once and during 24 hours time interval. Please get a new link.
